title: Game crashes and gives me wait time....
body: ok for real i wasnt mad the first time but this is just ridiculous..... why does your game keep giving me leave buster wait times when the CLIENT CRASHES....i havent left a single game recently and while im in champ select the damn game will crash and say i left.... i dont have time for this... i enjoy playing league a lot with my friends and play when i can but i have a full time job and a busy schedule so its pretty stupid when i have to wait 15mins for a game when i didnt do a single thing.... Thanks...plz fix asap.

replies.body:
The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) will continue to escalate the more you leave, and treats every leave equally regardless of intent.  It's really important that for not you stick to custom games to troubleshoot, and not queue up for matchmade games until you know the issue's been resolved.  

That said, I'd love to help but need more info.  When you say client crashes, what does that mean exactly?  Are there any error messages?  What are you seeing?

Hi, ive never done this b4 so didnt actually think anyone would answer but when im in champ select the game will freeze or crash and kick me from the lobby. i would not be upset with this if thats all it did but it will also give me a timer so i cant play another game until its gone. I would like it fixed because im not the one thats leaving. The game is kicking from the lobby when it freezes/crashes. Some errors i got were like... "unable to select champion" "unable to select spells" or it wouldnt say anything and just exit the lobby

Thanks for the info here, and I'm happy to help!  In this case, start off by disabling [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode, in case your PC might be going through too much stress during champion select by disabling the fancy aesthetics.

Should the issue continue, then your connection in champion select could be unstable, causing you to lose sync and get left behind.  You'll want to go through every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot that.

Keep in mind, it's really important that you test this out in custom games for now, until you're absolutely sure you can return to a matchmade queue.  I hope that helps!
Alright im about to leave for work now so ill have to try these methods next time im on but thank you for helping and i hope it works.
Sounds good!  Have a good day at work, frand!
